name: GitHub Actions: Monorepo Matrix
description: Run jobs per package in a monorepo using a matrix strategy.

files.template:
name: Monorepo CI

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        package: ['{{packages}}'.split(',')].flat()
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - name: Install deps
        working-directory: \${{ matrix.package }}
        run: npm ci || echo 'no package.json'
      - name: Lint
        working-directory: \${{ matrix.package }}
        run: npm run -s lint || echo 'no lint'
      - name: Test
        working-directory: \${{ matrix.package }}
        run: npm test --silent || echo 'no tests'
